description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Investment .

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn about Investment.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

Investment,
Process of Investment Management,
Fundamentals of Investment I,
Fundamentals of Investment II,
Fundamentals of Investment III,
Time value of Money,
Introduction to Banking I,
Introduction to Banking II,
Investment Banking I,
Investment Banking II,
Fixed Deposits,
Equity Shares,
Bonds,
Bonds and Debentures,
Mutual fund,
Gold Investment,
Real Estate,
Forex Market,
Exchange Rate I,
Exchange Rate II,


Includes following quizzes:

Investment,
Fundamentals of Investment,
Organizational Structure and Fixed Deposit,
Equity Share,


Includes following flashcards:

Investment,
Fundamentals of Investment,
Mutual Fund.


What is unique about RealSimpleEdu apps? 


 1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and  always works (no data connection required)
 
 2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning 

 3) Offers value for money (A lifetime of free updates) 

 4) 225,000 paying customers from 153 Countries

Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
